response.original_title: Bible and Homosexualty: Exegesis and Hermeneutic
response.overview: The bible readed through exegesis and hermeneutic don't mention any exclusion of the homosexuals, or abomination by God.  On the contrary, this movie shows reports and inclusion of homosexual couples.
response.tagline: bible, documentary, christian, homosexualty, homosexuals, homo
